issue.title: 🐛 Bug: default value not applied if value was modified before submitting link shared form

milestone.title: vNext
milestone.description: Issues that needs to be resolved within next few releases

issue.body:
### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ?

- [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this

### Steps to reproduce ?

- create a table with the column "port" of type number
- set the default value "443" for the column "port"
- create a form for this table
- share the form by link
- open the form via link
- type a number in the field "port"
- remove the value so that it is empty
- press submit

### Desired Behavior

There is a new record created with value 443 in the column port, because the field from the form was empty.

Actual Behavior:
column is empty because the form is send with value "null" for column "port"
This only happens on shared form. Submitting form as registered user works fine.
For shared form value is also applied correctly, if the column "port" was not modified

### Project Details

Node: **v16.19.1**
Arch: **x64**
Platform: **linux**
Docker: **false** (podman)
RootDB: **sqlite3**
PackageVersion: **0.109.1**

### Attachments

_No response_

issue.title: 🔦 Feature: Table View Public Link: Allow Viewer to Expand Long text Field and Record

milestone.title: vNext
milestone.description: Issues that needs to be resolved within next few releases

issue.body:
### Please confirm if feature request does NOT exists already ?

- [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this

### Describe the usecase for the feature

![image](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/55474996/77867d3c-f713-40cf-9692-ca8d32af1659)

If I share a Table view or embedded it on my site, it's not possible for a viewer to expand a long text-field or open any of the record in expanded card mode to read the entire cell. Making the cell-height-bigger doesn't help either.

### Suggested Solution

Just like for Editors:

When viewers hover of the record's number, they should be able to expand the record in card mode.

![image](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/55474996/99009c90-3a02-458d-b373-1c13c2374028)


When the viewer hovers over a long-text field, they should be able to expand that individual cell to read its entire text (with scroll)

![image](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/55474996/e8a9022b-d7e5-4fef-889a-cbc1e79ed447)

Text should also be displayed in "Wrap text" mode (whilst respecting the cell height) -> see example from Excel:

![image](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/55474996/a4e802e4-93d6-4b3c-a52b-341ca8456358)


### Additional Context

Related: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/issues/2271

Airtable example:
![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86527202/172102383-26472fd1-662b-4642-90f8-c602285b1678.png)

comment.body: expansion of expanded record is now available; but viewer still doesn't have expand record option

## Uffizzi Ephemeral Environment Deploying

:cloud: https://app.uffizzi.com/github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/6815

:gear: Updating now by workflow run [6666551521](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/actions/runs/6666551521).

What is Uffizzi? [Learn more](https://www.uffizzi.com)!

The PR changes have been deployed. Please run the following command to verify:
```
docker run -d -p 8888:8080 nocodb/nocodb-timely:0.202.5-pr-6815-20231027-1049
```

issue.title: 🔦 Feature: Add "Copy Value" button in context menu
issue.body: ### Please confirm if feature request does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Describe the usecase for the feature I have a table with my contacts and table with email addresses. A contact has in the row "Email Addresses" a link to the "Email Addresses" table. When I need to copy the email address, I copy the cell with all the metadata. However, I only need the email address. ``` [{"Id":25867,"Email Address":"nils@sharezone.net"}] ``` https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/24459435/44070ed3-71f7-4f53-b8ec-4d1114170618 ### Suggested Solution Having a "Copy Value" button that just copies the value of the cell would be helpful 👍 ### Additional Context _No response_

comment.body:
LTAR field is now changed to rollup based Links field. 
One can create a lookup field on Links field; copy on lookup field yields mail ID but wrapped under quotes & square brackets`["raju@nocodb.com"]`

issue.title: 🐛 Bug: Linking failed: DataLoader must be constructed with a function which accepts Array<key> and returns Promise<Array<value>>, but the function did not return a Promise of an Array of the same length as the Array of keys

labels.name: 🔎 Status: More Info Needed
labels.description: More information is required to figure out the root cause.

issue.body:
### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ?

- [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this

### Steps to reproduce ?

- Create a 1-N relationship on Nocodb [or on Postgres itself] between table 1 and table 2
- Table 1 has many items on table 2
- Entering a value on any column on table 1 shows no error, and the value updated
- Entering a value on any column on table 2 show the error, but the value still updated.
- Drop the relationship and everything is back to normal
- There is no issue if N-N relationship created between 2 tables

### Desired Behavior

No error showed just like other relationship created with the database

### Project Details

Node: **v16.19.1**
Arch: **x64**
Platform: **linux**
Docker: **true**
RootDB: **sqlite3**
PackageVersion: **0.109.1**

### Attachments

![Screenshot from 2023-06-16 10-26-18](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/76666786/c4843384-2b36-49c2-ad34-a0abc1b709c9)

comment.body: please reopen this thread if you still see issue persist with latest release

issue.title: 🐛 Bug: sync meta error after delete table
issue.body: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? I delete some table from mysql database, in nocodb datasource page, use sync meta, can detected change. but when sync meta, have this notice: delete from `nc_columns_v2` where `fk_model_id` = 'md_zdl6obhvi9imbu' - Cannot delete or update a parent row: a foreign key constraint fails (`nocodb`.`nc_col_relations_v2`, CONSTRAINT `nc_col_relations_v2_fk_parent_column_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`fk_parent_column_id`) REFERENCES `nc_columns_v2` (`id`)) ### Desired Behavior the tables is create by nocodb in other database ### Project Details Node: **v16.19.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** RootDB: **mysql2** PackageVersion: **0.109.1** ### Attachments

comment.body: did you end up deleting some of meta tables of NocoDB? @sunknight please reopen this thread if issue still persists with latest release.

issue.title: 🐛 Bug: Updates Committed to Data Source while being keyed in but before being committed to NocoDB
issue.body:
### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ?

- [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this

### Steps to reproduce ?

Hi,

NocoDB appears to be committing changes to the data as soon as they're typed into the cell and BEFORE pressing the 'enter' key to commit them to NocoDB itself. As an example, if one were to type 'NocoDB' one letter at the time this would create 6 individual updates for each letter in the underlaying table. This is not great from the audit perspective as a single update in NocoDB creates multiple updates in SQL  

### Desired Behavior

Updates should be committed to the underlying data source only once they've been committed in NocoDB and NOT while they're being made / keyed in. 

### Project Details

I'm using the latest version of NocoDB using Docker and a SQL Server data table as my data source 

### Attachments

_No response_

comment.body: to be discussed - consider increasing debounce time

issue.title: 🔦 Feature: Monday as first day of week in calendar popup
issue.body:
### Please confirm if feature request does NOT exists already ?

- [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this

### Describe the usecase for the feature

Currently popup calendar view only shows Sunday as first day of week which is not right for most European side of the world and use Monday as first day instead.
![f1e44c0015438911](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/assets/20393079/496edb1b-9036-4757-b941-527367105df2)


### Suggested Solution

Add a project setting to change first day to Monday when using calendar popup while changing value in date type column.

### Additional Context

_No response_

comment.body: Yes @dstala I wish to pick it up. Should I make it configurable via env?

issue.title: 🐛 Bug: Failed to load list: b.startsWith is not a function when linking records

labels.name: Status: Reproducible
labels.description: Able to reproduce the issue based on the reporters' guideline.

issue.body:
### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ?

- [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this

### Steps to reproduce ?

We have a base with two tables. Table A has entries with a lot of metadata and around 120 entrie Table B has a kanban board for issues and references entries from Table A. When i go to link entries and use the search function to find the correct entriy i get the error message

`Failed to load list: b.startsWith is not a function
`
The find function is also not working, the list of entries does not get smaller

The Main Field for Table A and the thing i am searching for is a Number Field.

Also if i am Searching for anythiung else besides a number (string of text) i get an even more convoluted error:

`Failed to load children list: select (select count("__nc_rollup"."ncRecordId") from "nc_3b6m___Videoproduktion" as "__nc_rollup" inner join "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_aq3jk50nk1" on "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_aq3jk50nk1"."table2_id" = "__nc_rollup"."ncRecordId" where "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_aq3jk50nk1"."table1_id" = "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."ncRecordId") as "Videoproduktion", (select count("__nc_rollup"."ncRecordId") from "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion" as "__nc_rollup" inner join "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_o4fhlh5xqe" on "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_o4fhlh5xqe"."table1_id" = "__nc_rollup"."ncRecordId" where "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_o4fhlh5xqe"."table2_id" = "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."ncRecordId") as "Stundenproduktions", (select count("__nc_rollup"."ncRecordId") from "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion" as "__nc_rollup" inner join "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_o4fhlh5xqe" on "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_o4fhlh5xqe"."table2_id" = "__nc_rollup"."ncRecordId" where "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_o4fhlh5xqe"."table1_id" = "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."ncRecordId") as "Field 57", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Nummer" as "Nummer", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Vorschauvideo" as "Vorschauvideo", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Video_01_Vorwissen_aktivieren" as "Video 01 - Vorwissen aktivieren", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Video_02_Einf_hrung" as "Video 02 - Einführung", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."_bung_03_mit_Grafiken_" as "Übung 03 (mit Grafiken)", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Video_04_Erarbeitung" as "Video 04 - Erarbeitung", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."_bung_05_mit_Grafiken_" as "Übung 05 (mit Grafiken)", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Video_06_Vertiefung" as "Video 06 - Vertiefung", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Video_07_Ergebnissicherung" as "Video 07 - Ergebnissicherung", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Arbeitsblatt_mittel_" as "Arbeitsblatt (mittel)", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Abschlusstest_mittel_" as "Abschlusstest (mittel)", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."_bung_08_mit_Grafiken_" as "Übung 08 (mit Grafiken)", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Abschlusstest_entspricht_dem_Arbeitsblatt" as "Abschlusstest entspricht dem Arbeitsblatt", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."_berpr_ft_von" as "überprüft von", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Antares_Jahr" as "Antares-Jahr", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."_fn_utitel_" as "'fn_utitel'", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Antares_Nummer" as "Antares-Nummer", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Antares_Schlagw_rter" as "Antares-Schlagwörter", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Antares_Teaser" as "Antares-Teaser", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Antares_URL" as "Antares-URL", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Antares_Lernziele" as "Antares-Lernziele", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."Antares_Bemerkung" as "Antares-Bemerkung", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."ncRecordId" as "ncRecordId", "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."ncRecordHash" as "ncRecordHash" from "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion" inner join "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_aq3jk50nk1" on "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_aq3jk50nk1"."table1_id" = "nc_3b6m___Stundenproduktion"."ncRecordId" where "nc_3b6m___nc_m2m_aq3jk50nk1"."table2_id" in (select "ncRecordId" from "nc_3b6m___Videoproduktion" where "ncRecordId" = 'rc_hq88ky0d81hi65') and (("Nummer" = '' or "Nummer" is not null)) limit 10 - invalid input syntax for type bigint: ""`


My Table Data is imported from AIrtable, so mybe something got messed up there?

### Desired Behavior

When i search for an entry while linking Tables it should display that entry and no error messages

### Project Details

NocoDB runs a s a docker through the provided docker-compose file


Base Info:
Node: **v18.17.1**
Arch: **x64**
Platform: **linux**
Docker: **true**
RootDB: **pg**
PackageVersion: **0.202.4**

## Change Summary

Provide summary of changes with issue number if any.

## Change type

- [ ] feat: (new feature for the user, not a new feature for build script)
- [x] fix: (bug fix for the user, not a fix to a build script)
- [ ] docs: (changes to the documentation)
- [ ] style: (formatting, missing semi colons, etc; no production code change)
- [ ] refactor: (refactoring production code, eg. renaming a variable)
- [ ] test: (adding missing tests, refactoring tests; no production code change)
- [ ] chore: (updating grunt tasks etc; no production code change)

## Test/ Verification

Provide summary of changes.

## Additional information / screenshots (optional)

Anything for maintainers to be made aware of
